game.title: Incredibox
game.description: Incredibox is a music app that lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style among 9 impressive atmospheres and start to lay down, record and share your mix.

specifications.languages: English, Italiano, Français, Deutsch, Pусский, Español, Norsk, Português, Polski, Türkçe, Українська, 한국어, 日本語, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Tiếng Việt, Indonesia

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
